JOB DESCRIPTION: Job Description      They are looking to hire an experienced Principal Software Engineer to maintain and upgrade all existing software. Your responsibilities include recommending adjustments to resolve software issues, improving the functionality of existing software, and ensuring that the design, application, and maintenance of software meets the quality standards of the company. You should also be able to mentor, guide and train other engineers. You should be able to evaluate the user s needs, time limitations and system limitations when developing software.    Responsibilities:     Designing, coding, and debugging software.   Improving the performance of existing software.   Providing training to other engineers.   Maintaining and upgrading existing software.   Recommending new technologies that can help increase productivity.   Supervising and overseeing the technical aspects of projects.   Investigating software-related complaints and making necessary adjustments to ensure optimal software performance.   Regularly attending team meetings to discuss projects, brainstorm ideas, and put forward solutions to any issues.
